description: This file defines an Angular component 'RecipeDetailPageComponent' responsible for displaying the details of a specific recipe. It imports Angular core modules, routing, and related services and components, and subscribes to route parameters to fetch and display recipe data.

classes.name: RecipeDetailPageComponent
classes.description: Angular component that handles displaying detailed information about a single recipe based on route parameters.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes ActivatedRoute and RecipeService instances via dependency injection.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that retrieves the recipe ID from the route parameters and fetches the recipe data from the service.
